p: Traditional methods for monitoring the activity of RNA helicases use radioactively labeled dsRNA substrates and follow the unwinding reaction by electrophoretic separation (nondenaturing PAGE) of the ss reaction products, which are detected autoradiographically ( Adedeji et al., 2012, Utama et al., 2000). To determine whether the inhibitor affects binding of helicase to nucleic acid, a standard gel mobility shift assay is usually used ( Adedeji et al., 2012).
